snippet: Carl Froch vacated his International Boxing Federation supermiddleweight title because of an elbow injury. Froch, 37, was hurt in training.
lead_paragraph: Carl Froch vacated his International Boxing Federation supermiddleweight title because of an elbow injury. Froch, 37, was hurt in training.

headline.main: Injured Froch Vacates His I.B.F. Title
headline.print_headline: Injured Froch Vacates His I.B.F. Title
